"I wished my best friend a happy birthday, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never have meaningful relationships or achieve anything significant."

Explanation:

The original post uses a global attributional style, suggesting that the person's failure to wish their best friend a happy birthday will lead to failure in all aspects of their life. In contrast, a specific attributional style would focus on the specific event or situation without generalizing it to other areas of life.

Therefore, the transferred post focuses on the specific event of wishing a happy birthday and its impact on the person's relationships or achievements, rather than generalizing it to their entire life.
